headline: GL Q4 Deep Dive: Sales Growth Amid Medicare Supplement Tailwinds and Margin Shifts
summary: Insurance holding company Globe Life (NYSE:GL) missed Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q4 CY2025 as sales rose 4.1% year on year to $1.53 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $3.39 per share was 1.3% below analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Is Globe Life (GL) Attractively Priced After Strong Multi Year Share Price Gains?
summary: If you are wondering whether Globe Life is attractively priced right now, the key question is how its current share price compares to what the underlying business might reasonably be worth. The stock recently closed at US$144.82, with returns of 4.5% over 7 days, 3.0% over 30 days, 4.6% year to date, 18.6% over 1 year, 22.1% over 3 years and 63.5% over 5 years, which may influence how investors are thinking about both opportunity and risk. headline: Globe Life (GL) Valuation Check After Fourth Quarter Earnings Miss On Revenue And Net Income Estimates
summary: Globe Life (GL) is back in focus after its fourth quarter 2025 earnings, where revenue of US$1.52b and net income of US$266.08m came in below analyst forecasts despite year over year growth. See our latest analysis for Globe Life. Globe Life shares recently traded at US$144.82, with a 7 day share price return of 4.53% and a 90 day share price return of 9.85%. The 1 year total shareholder return of 18.64% sits ahead of the shorter term moves, which may indicate that momentum has been building...
